title: Submit for Certification
heading: Submit for Certification
content:
## 

Library Certification

[](#library-certification)

To submit for Clever Library Certification, please complete [this form](https://airtable.com/app2ptMbyoNH48Wk9/pagHEY30LluyN15Vr/form).

## 

District SSO and Secure Sync Certification

[](#district-sso-and-secure-sync-certification)

To submit for District SSO and/or Secure Sync certification, please reach out to your Clever Application Success Manager.

## 

What do I do after I've submitted?

[](#what-do-i-do-after-ive-submitted)

### 

Library Certification

[](#library-certification-1)

Our team will review your submission and reach out with next steps. Due to the high volume of requests, this typically takes 1-2 business weeks, but times can vary depending on our bandwidth.

### 

District SSO and Secure Sync Certification

[](#district-sso-and-secure-sync-certification-1)

Our team will review your submission and reach out with next steps within 5 business days.
